Package org.lightsleep.database

Classes to create SQLs for some database management systems.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Database
    An interface to generate SQLs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MySQL
    A database handler for MySQL.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    Oracle
    A database handler for Oracle Database.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    PostgreSQL
    A database handler for PostgreSQL.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    SQLite
    A database handler for SQLite.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    SQLServer
    A database handler for Microsoft SQL Server.
    The object of this class has a TypeConverter map with the following additional TypeConverter to Standard.typeConverterMap.
    Standard
    A database handler that does not depend on the particular DBMS.

Package org.lightsleep.database Description

Classes to create SQLs for some database management systems.
